meanings.sent1: My old teddy bear is my trusty companion on all my adventures.
meanings.sent2: The trusty flashlight never failed to light up the dark path.
meanings.sent3: I asked my trusty umbrella to protect me from the rain, but it decided to take a day off!
meanings.sent4: Her trusty smile could always brighten up the gloomiest of days.
meanings.sent5: The trusty old dog faithfully waited for his owner to return home every day.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that can be relied on or trusted
meanings.sent1: The loyal dog became the trusty guardian of the house.
meanings.sent2: The trusty old car never let us down on our road trips.
meanings.sent3: The trusty alarm clock decided to play a prank and not ring in the morning!
meanings.sent4: She was a trusty friend who always offered a listening ear.
meanings.sent5: The trusty map guided us safely through the winding forest trails.
